DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to investigate the concentration-effect relationship of inhaled milrinone after prophylactic administration in cardiac surgical patients with preoperative pulmonary hypertension undergoing cardiopulmonary bypass.
DOC.detailed_description: Milrinone elimination will be verify with blood and urine samples analysis.
DOC.criteria: Patients scheduled for elective cardiac surgery under CPB High risk patients: NYHA class IIIII Preoperative diagnostic of pulmonary hypertension: Systolic pulmonary artery pressure (sPAP) > 35 mm Hg; or Mean pulmonary artery pressure (mPAP) > 25 mm Hg; or mAP/mPAP < 3.0 (after induction of anesthesia). Open Heart Surgery Contraindication to transesophageal echocardiography (TEE) Hemodynamic instability before surgery Emergency surgery
